name: Bull
text:
Hereby I present myself: I am Man of Bulls - Baron of Fire.

I have decided to avail myself of your services, feel honored!

I am going to get the magnificent Countess Rose' bosoms wrapped inside my muscular arms, and that already on Midsummer's Eve!

For this I need a powerful rocket fired up into the glittering summer sky around noon.

Again and again!

Until she gets so very mesmerized that I must bring her back down to Earth again, with a mighty confession of love and passion.
positiveFeedback: By Chongli! My heart will always burn with slow remembrance of that magic night of fire and roses!
negativeFeedback: You little insignificant louse, miserable cockroach! I will break you, you fucking peasant!
neutralFeedback: I embraced Rose that night and kissed her like a true poet. Afterwards: Rose walked home and I have not heard from her since then. If you had constructed an even better rocket maybe she would have sent a letter for me in the next morning?
